contentrichtext.text: The '''Queensland People's Party''' was a conservative political party in [[Queensland]], [[Australia]]. Created in 1943 by Brisbane Lord Mayor [[John Beals Chandler]], the Queensland People's Party contested elections in [[South East Queensland]]. In 1948, they became the Queensland branch of the [[Liberal Party of Australia]]. ==Leaders== *[[John Beals Chandler]], 1943-46 *[[Arthur Bruce Pie]], 1946-48 *[[Thomas Hiley]], 1948 [[Category:Conservative parties in Australia]] [[Category:Defunct political parties in Queensland]] [[Category:Political parties established in 1943]] {{Australia-party-stub}}
